thread.section_title: Bike24 Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Bike24 | www.bike24.net
thread.title: John Mearns

author: John Mearns
title: John Mearns
text: Probably not the best of reviews as I was already losing my rag. SRAM a company I am rapidly coming to dislike have invented a new interface for the tool required to bleed their brakes which retails around £20 plus whatever you need to connect it to - another £40. I have done a lot of researching on line to find this tool and most UK suppliers are out of stock or are supplying something with a black fitting which looks like plastic and I suspect no good. Anyway to cut the rant short Bike24 had what I needed - thank you but it is pretty expensive you get no stars for that although to be fair not out of line with other suppliers but still ridiculous money. Yours Moaning Mearnie.
